Definition: Questions and sections within the Questionnaire.

Short: An id for the item expressed as a string.
Definition: An id for the item expressed as a string.

Short: A URI that refers to an ElementDefinition that provides information about this item, including information that might otherwise be included in the instance of the Questionnaire resource.
Definition: A URI that refers to an ElementDefinition that provides information about this item, including information that might otherwise be included in the instance of the Questionnaire resource.

Short: The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.
Definition: The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.

Short: A string that should precede the item; for example, an honorific before a person's name, or a question number before a question.
Definition: A string that should precede the item; for example, an honorific before a person's name, or a question number before a question.

Short: Questions and sections within the Questionnaire.
Definition: Questions and sections within the Questionnaire.

Short: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.
Definition: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

Short: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.
Definition: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.

Short: Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted - whether all or any must be true.
Definition: Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted - whether all or any must be true.

Short: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.
Definition: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.

Short: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.
Definition: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.

Short: An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.
Definition: An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.

Short: The maximum number of characters that are permitted in a text field.
Definition: The maximum number of characters that are permitted in a text field.

Short: Canonical URL of the valueset containing permitted answers.
Definition: Canonical URL of the valueset containing permitted answers.

Short: One of the permitted answers for a 'choice' or 'open-choice' question, and whether that answer should be initially selected.
Definition: One of the permitted answers for a 'choice' or 'open-choice' question, and whether that answer should be initially selected.

Short: One or more values that should be pre-populated in the answer when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input.
Definition: One or more values that should be pre-populated in the answer when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input.
